title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Patience is warranted as you and a friend untangle knots in your communication process. Frayed nerves could short-circuit your connection while the opposition between Mercury in precise Virgo and Neptune in fuzzy Pisces is in the picture. Chances are youre talking past each other rather than to each other today. Spend more time confirming what you hear instead of assuming you already know their side of the story. Engaging with both your ears and your heart prevents misunderstandings from multiplying. Keep your bond tight and clear by listening more than you speak. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
